verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Send the light,
the blessed gospel light;
Let it shine
from shore to shore

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Send the light,
the blessed gospel light
Let it shine forevermore!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There's a call comes ringing o'er the restless wave,
"Send the light!
Send the light!"

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
There are souls to rescue, there are souls to save,
"Send the light!
Send the light!"

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
We have heard the Macedonian call today,
"Send the light!
Send the light!"

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And a golden off'ring at the cross we lay,
"Send the light!
Send the light!"

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Let us pray that grace
may everywhere abound,
"Send the light!
Send the light!"

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
And a Christ-like spirit everywhere be found,
"Send the light!
Send the light!"

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Let us not grow weary
in the work of love,
"Send the light!
Send the light!"

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Let us gather jewels
for a crown above,
"Send the light!
Send the light!"
